name: Superior Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Ordinance, 2019
tagline: Repealing the President's Order No. 15 of 1980
content:
PART I]     THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, E XTRA., APRIL   8,  201 8 499 
 
 
 
 
ISLAMABAD,  FRIDAY , NOVEMBER   1,  2019 
 
 
PART I  
 
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations  
 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKIST AN 
MINISTRY OF LAW AND JUSTICE  
 
Islamabad, the 31st October , 201 9 
 
  No. F.2(1)/201 9-Pub.— The following Ordinance promulgated o n 30th 
October, 2019 by the President is hereby published for general information :— 
 
ORDINANCE  NO. XIX  OF 2019 
AN 
ORDINANCE  
          
to repeal the President’s Order No. 15 of  1980 
 
 WHEREAS  it is expedient  to repeal the Superior Courts (Court Dress and 
Mode of Address) Order, 198 0 (P.O.  No. 15 of 198 0); 
 
 AND WHEREAS  the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session 
and the President is satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary to 
take immediate action;  
 
 
 
(499) 
 
Price: Rs. 5.00 
 
[1706 (2019)/Ex. Gaz.].   
500 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., NOVEMBER   1,  201 9 [PART I 
 
  NOW, THEREFORE , in exercise of powers conferred by clause (1) of 
Article 89 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republi c of Pakistan, the President is 
pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance :— 
 
 1. Short title and comm encement. — (1) This Ordinance may be 
called the Superior Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) 
Ordinance, 2019.   
 
 (2) It shall come into force at once.  
 
 2. Repeal  of President’ s Order No.15 of 1980. — The Superior 
Courts (Court Dress and  Mode of Address) Order, 198 0 (P.O.  No. 15 of 198 0), is 
hereby repealed.  
 
  
 
DR. ARIF ALVI , 
President . 
 
————  
 
 
MUHAMMAD KHASHIH -UR-REHMAN , 
Secretary.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
———————————————————————————— ————  
PRINTED  BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF  PAKI STAN PRESS,  ISLAMABAD .  
PUBLISHED BY THE  DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD , KARACHI .
